name: Brick it On Free
description:
Addictive time killer game for everyone.

How to play :

- Tap on Brick falling line to stop it.
- One touch control for best gameplay.

Other Features :

- Time Mode : 30, 60 & 90 secs
- Make top score and challenge your friends
- Game center integrated for checking high scores in all 3 time modes.

Enjoy and Have fun.
